title: DMMU Bankura Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 47 Community Auditor Post
description: District Mission Management Unit Bankura (DMMU Bankura) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 47 Community Auditor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Intermediate (10+2) can grab this chance and apply for the DMMU Bankura Notification 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the speci...
